metadata.name: PMS GEN #1
metadata.description:
PIRATE MONEY SYNDICATEâ˜ ï¸
 THE IRL NFT CLUBHOUSE DREAMðŸ’«

 We're making the IRL NFT clubhouse dream a reality, the roadmap will cover 3 separate clubhouse locations!

NOT ENOUGH? WE THINK SO TOO!

Note that the roadmap is just a mint stage goal system for incentive, we will be expanding to more locations post-mint:

- We will cover the remainder of the community 'hotspot-zones'
- We will expand into other global locals and in other industries
- We will always consider the holder, giving them perks when using any PMS facilities

WHAT IF THE BLOCKCHAIN HAS AN ANEURYSM?

- We understand uncertainty is real, so we have a data redundancy plan that also benefits holders!

- We have a 5D quartz eternity data storage disc ( cd sized ) initiative, to make use of the technology to store up to 360TB of data, including our collection

- There's also a benefit of storing your collection if you own 0.05% volume( as a founder of a collection + holder of PMS 100NFTs )
- This is a costly investment however this isn't a single disc, we will have a copy of the 5D data redundancy at all 'clubhouse' locations

SO WHAT'S IN IT FOR ME AS A HOLDER?

 Let's not forget the perks of being a holder!ðŸ»â˜ ï¸ 

Each clubhouse will be packed with ways to relax, unwind and look after our holders: >>>

FIXED CLUBHOUSE DESIGN ELEMENTS 
- VIP holder's only lounge ( chill in peace & meet with other club members )
- Conference/ Entertainment hall ( for those high thoughts / light bulbs )
- NFT art & art gallery hall ( 3 Sections > / public / club / holder sections )
- Merch store ( regional exclusives + IRL holder exclusives )
- Restaurant & bar ( regional themes )
- 2go-meal snack bars ( coffee, drinks, snacks, sandwiches .etc )
- Kid's corner ( 3+ yrs supervised play center, take a break while you visit )
- Open plan seating hall ( read a book/ eat or watch something )
- Fitness gym, pool & sauna ( health is important! so keep up with your health )
- Meditation / zen garden ,aviary & koi pond ( stress management & peice of mind )
- Designated smoking rooms ( preferably smoke here )
- Old school new school arcade ( from Space Invaders to VR BeatSaber )
- Above ground & underground parking sections

VARIABLE CLUBHOUSE DIFFERENCES
- Outdoor activities (community poll vote)
- Structural Design Elements (regionally influenced)
- Interior Design Elements (regionally influenced)
- Clubhouse NFT Monuments (each clubhouse different)
